1.content:
Mia followed her friend Nicole into the living room. School had just let out for the summer, and the two were so relieved. "Oh my god I thought 4th period would never end," Nicole said as she walked over to the couch. Mia followed behind her silently.

"Hey cheer up Mia, there's zillions of other people out there," her friend put an arm around her and gave her a quick hug, Mia's chin grazed the tit flesh of her best friend, "That Derek loser didn't know what he had anyways."

Mia smiled a little bit, maybe Nicole was right. Just then the front door opened and in walked Nicole's little sister: Taylor. She threw her shoes off and sighed with relief, "Ah fuck it feels good to be outta that hell-hole," she exlaimed. She walked past the couch, she shook her ass a lil as she passed Mia. She stopped at the doorway to the Kitchen and turned, "Hey Mia," she said with a smile, "You want anything?"

"No thank you," Mia answered weakly.

Taylor shrugged and walked into the kitchen, "How come you didn't offer me anything?" Nicole yelled after her little sister.

"You live here," she replied back.

Nicole sighed, "I'll be right back Mia, you sure you don't want anything?" she asked, Mia nodded, "Ok then you better be happy when I come back young lady or else," she teased.

Mia smiled weakly as she watched her friend walk off. Why couldn't she have breasts like Nicole or an ass like Taylor? Maybe then she could keep a boyfriend. Nicole - Mia's oldest and best friend, also 18. She has above average breasts, and get's alot of attention. She is very maternal and loves children. She wants to be a nanny or something to do with little kids when she grows up.

Taylor - Nicole's little sister, 16. She's a tomboy through and through, she loves to fart and burp and curse. She has average breasts, and a huge ass. She's secretly bi-sexual and has a crush on Mia. She also has a real dominering personality, covering a slightly maternal side.

Katie - Nicole's youngest sister, 8. She loves to play with dolls. She's a typical 8 year old girly girl.

Susan - Nicole's mom 38. She's a bit plump, but not quite fat. She has a huge ass and huge breasts. She's usually a very nice woman, but she's starved for sex.
